abstract: Former middleweight champion Jermain Taylor pleads guilty to series of criminal charges in deal with Little Rock, Ark, prosecutors.
lead_paragraph: Taylor struck a deal with prosecutors and pleaded guilty to more than a half-dozen charges stemming from three separate episodes over the past year.

headline.main: Former Champion Jermain Taylor Pleads Guilty

snippet: Taylor struck a deal with prosecutors and pleaded guilty to more than a half-dozen charges stemming from three separate episodes over the past year.
